text: Bishop Michael Akasius Toppo is the current serving bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Tezpur, Assam, India. == Early Life & Education == Toppo was born on 8 May 1955 in Gormara, Assam, India. He studied at St. Paul's minor seminary, Shillong, Christ King College Shillong and St. Albert's College Ranchi. == Priesthood == On 26 January 1986 Toppo was ordained a priest. == Episcopate == Toppo was appointed Bishop of Tezpur, India by Pope Benedict XVI on 3 December 2007 and consecrated by Pedro López Quintana on 2 March 2008. == See also == List of Catholic bishops of India == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Indian bishops Category:Catholic bishops
